channel.title: Game keeps crashing.
channel.description:
Im on area bm_c2a2c ive done the part where you drive the bigger train car with the km/h display on the screen which then shorts and you crash through a door and land in the water. Ive managed to get back upto the top but im now stuck where you have to walk down the track. You get to a corner with a blue door on the left just as i go past it shows the "loading" dialog and keeps crashing to desktop saying "a problem has caused hl2.exe to close". (unable to get screenshot as game crashes before i can press f12).
Anyone else having this or know of a fix?
Thanks
